thread.title: Investigation on Behalf of Live Nation Investors Announced by Holzer & Holzer

author: cnbc.com
title: Investigation on Behalf of Live Nation Investors Announced by Holzer & Holzer
text:
ATLANTA--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Holzer & Holzer, LLC is investigating whether Live Nation Entertainment, Inc. (“Live Nation” or the “Company”) (NYSE: LYV) complied with the federal securities laws. On April 1, 2018, the New York Times reported that the U.S. Department of Justice is investigating whether Live Nation engaged in anticompetitive behavior in violation of U.S. antitrust laws. The price of Live Nation stock fell significantly following the report.
If you purchased Live Nation common stock between August 10, 2017 and March 30, 2018 and suffered a loss on that investment, you are encouraged to contact Marshall P. Dees, Esq. at mdees@holzerlaw.com or Alexandria P. Rankin, Esq. at arankin@holzerlaw.com , or call the firm by toll-free telephone at (888) 508-6832.
Holzer & Holzer, LLC is an Atlanta, Georgia law firm that dedicates its practice to vigorous representation of shareholders and investors in litigation nationwide, including shareholder class action and derivative litigation. More information about the firm is available through its website, www.holzerlaw.com and upon request from the firm. Holzer & Holzer, LLC has paid for the dissemination of this promotional communication, and Corey D. Holzer is the attorney responsible for its content.
